title: Why I'm Sticking With Google - Pixel 5a
description: Get yourself a dbrand skin TODAY at   The Google Pixel 5a might be the last Google phone using Qualcomm's Snapdragon processor, but wow, what a phone it is! So do you really need a flagship smartphone where you barely use all the features or something solid at 1/3 the price? James tells you why he's sticking with Google.   Check out the Google Pixel 5a at   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
